fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 30Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 30Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level expression [Delta Down All CCY 30Y]*[Date Sign] to DAX with fully qualified column references. This is a row-level calculation (no aggregations or parameters), so it is implemented as a calculated column.
